subject: Add subworkflow call node to each downstream workflow
description: Add an execute_auth_workflow node at the start of call_association, job_reminder, and review_request that calls the auth workflow and passes token+config downstream.
activeForm: Adding auth subworkflow calls to downstream workflows

metadata.evidence: n8n API returned success for all 3 workflows: fkTzuzjXYwxSGtlr (call_association, updated in prior session), knB3ZyreIIQwZh9k (job_reminder, 8/8 ops applied), 07ki4WkQol61XZPQ (review_request, 8/8 ops applied)
